entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:10 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:02 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:02 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
